name: Jessica Boham
text: This pizza is WORTH the drive over!! Tried stuffed crust pepperoni w/herb garlic crust and this definitely out-pizzas any pizza I have had before. We will be back soon!

name: Jay Poore
text: Horrible delivery experience. The place is literally five minutes away and it took an hour and seven minutes to get here after the app indicated my order was "On the road 19 minutes after I ordered it. ‚Ä¶More

name: Carrie Brannan
text: Our order is always correct and delicious. We absolutely love the subs and get them just about every time we order. Delicious! Friendly staff.

name: Joe Colon
text: I walked in and ordered a 3 topping large pizza. They quickly put it together and stuck it in the oven. Ten minutes later and I had my pizza. $16 for a large pizza seemed excessive, but it was tasty: pepperoni, bacon and pineapple with garlic crust.

name: JoAnne Harrison
text: Ordered a jr cheese pizza get a jr pepperoni pizza order a large  stake and onion pizza get maby a med pizza by far this is the last time we order here.. not to mention the cheesy crazy bread is under cooked and the stake and cheese is burnt

name: STVRCZ
text: First had Howie's in Panama City FL. Was surprised to see them here in Indy! Still has the same great taste we've come to crave. The subs are awesome!

name: Brenna Poggemann
text: LOVED this pizza growing up! This is a step up from the regular pizza chains. The flavored crust is to DIE for! Plus the bread is amazing. It is on the greasy end. But always reliably good. It is a family favorite! Always had good ‚Ä¶More

name: sergio castillo
text: I have tried to call several times in the last month,  tried to order pizza for delivery at least once a week and the employees will not pick up the phone. Please hire motivated individuals who really want to work. Probably should start ‚Ä¶More

name: Bailey Moore
text: didn‚Äôt answer the phone immediately went to voicemail and said ‚Äúgoodbye‚Äù you could AT LEAST pick up the phone and tell us you aren‚Äôt delivering.  don‚Äôt have a lot of money with me just a gift card and the kids working here need to grow up ‚Ä¶More

name: Sean Stansifer
text: I loved this place for a while, but now they refuse to deliver because there are not enough employees. and now, when I call to make an order for pick up, the automated system thanks me for calling and immediately says "good bye". I want to like their pizza, but since I can't order, I've forgotten how good they taste.

name: Kennedy Stapleton
text: I was hangry and you wouldn‚Äôt bring me pizza and now I am crying and it‚Äôs all your fault.

name: Going Hot Armory
text:
Twice in a row the online orders have taken over 90 mins to be delivered. Both times items were missing.
This last time, they only brought half of a $65 order and the driver said she ‚Ä¶More

name: Mindee B
text: The pizza is OK. I appreciate that they give such commendable military discounts!

name: SilentSerpent
text: Ate here, Worked here, Loved here. Miss working with everyone, the staff is extremely friendly. ‚Ä¶More

name: kevin seevers
text: They lady that took my order over the phone (Carlishia) did and excellent job. She had very good knowledge on every question I asked. Helped me way above and beyond. Didnt feel rushed or any kinda frustration. Need more people like this in ‚Ä¶More

name: John Shea
text:
Get the Howie bread.

Howard thanks for your response, yes it was  close and  could have been a 5 if ‚Ä¶More

name: Anthony Faulkner
text: Ordered online, waited 1+ hour for delivery only to be informed that I was outside of their delivery range, even though they had delivered to me many many times in the past. Started off better, and has slowly fallen into lower than mediocrity. Do not order or spend money here.

name: TJ Moore
text: Used their $5.99 & $7.99 deals for a meal and dessert for 5 people, still had leftovers

name: William Mason
text: Great pizza, fast delivery, our new favorite pizza place!

name: Michelle Sichting
text: One of our favorite pizza places! Pizza is great 98% of the time and the service is quick. We get rewards for ordering online and through the app. The employees for the most part are super friendly as well. Delivery time isn't the best but it's comparable to other delivery times.

name: Dustin N
text: Not to bad of a pizza same for the price.

name: Mark Lashley
text: Pretty darn good for a delivery pizza. Only had a few better and they cost twice as much. Great job Howie!

name: C Sullivan
text: Terrible customer service. I tried to call in a delivery order but was told "no delivery drivers were available & his car was "out of commission". I hung up with the employee and decided to go ahead and order online and pick up the order ‚Ä¶More

name: Shel Lo
text: Love Hungry Howie's!  Very flavorful pizza crust.  On time delivery and friendly delivery driver each time so far.

name: BrAnDi BrEwEr
text: I love the food! I love the people and the management is amazing!  Everyone should come try our famous flavored crust pizza is all kinds of flavors. Mix em up! Your stomach will thank you!

name: David Brill
text: Great taste at a great price.

name: James Platten
text: Best tasting pizza with stuffed crust with seasoning to add to the crust.

name: Ronald Deter
text: Just not what a pizza place should be it should be just pizza

name: Craig Hawley
text: Great quick service really friendly people

name: Capitan Chunk
text: Best pizza ever. Garlic butter flavored crust can't be beat!

name: Jose Alatorre
text: They are rude i don't know who it was but i am a new customer and i called to complain about the boneless chicken wings  and the guy was rude and hung up on me. First the wing where burn and the pizza look like a frozen pizza from Walmart ‚Ä¶More

name: Matt Baker
text: Favorite pizza place! Food is good, doesn't feel like it was made in a rush. Order always complete, and when I forgot to take my 2L soda I paid for they automatically put a credit on my account.

name: Adam Keller
text: I like their pizza a lot.  The flavored crust is good and you can get a great family meal for under $30 unlike most other pizza places.  Hungry Howie's is my choice for local pizza!

name: Carey Hurley
text: Will not be ordering anymore! Has gotten worse and worse every order! And this last one was the last straw! Ordered at 655pm got the other at 805pm... being generous...the pizza is burnt I didn't get the crust I wanted the brownies tasted old or freezer burnt, something....and the sub was so greasy!! DONE!!!

name: Soshsi Strike
text: Bri. Period. (-1 for the attitude, +1 for the hookup üçï)

name: Quentin Smith
text: Great pizza, speedy & efficient service. Friendly customer service. Good location.

name: Christopher Kelly
text: Ordered the pizza online and was quoted 40 minutes.  90 minutes later I called to see where the pizza was and was told that it will be another 30 minutes.  they seemed very annoyed that I canceled my order.  I wonder if they will still charge my card.  this store has been getting progressively worse.

name: John Swafford
text: Best pizza west of Indy.

name: Patti Lacey
text: Pizza at this price is great.  I love the variety of flavored crusts.

name: josh Nickolls
text: Great pizza, fast service

name: Tommy Alba
text: Great pies, great price, and timely delivery.

name: Carl Krzywosinski
text: Good food.

name: Dana Qualls
text: Not as good as it once was. Poor service and product isn't as good.

text: Great Pizza !!

text: Great
